predicate.note: Frames file for 'cobble' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: creation and attribute
example.text: The bailout was cobbled [*-1] together over the weekend, with officials from the Federal Reserve Board, Securities and Exchange Commission, Comptroller of the Currency and Treasury as well as the options exchanges.
example.arg: with officials from the Federal Reserve Board, Securities and Exchange Commission, Comptroller of the Currency and Treasury as well as the options exchanges

example.name: creation and start state
example.text: Mr. Van de Kamp is the one who [*T*-2] collected the plans from the various radical environmental groups and cobbled them into a single unwieldy initiative to be placed on the ballot for election on Nov. 6, 1990.
example.arg: a single unwieldy initiative to be placed on the ballot for election on Nov. 6, 1990

example.name: creation and start state, different syntax
example.text: Mr. Van de Kamp is the one who [*T*-2] collected the plans from the various radical environmental groups and cobbled a single unwieldy initiative to be placed on the ballot for election on Nov. 6, 1990 out of them.
example.arg: a single unwieldy initiative to be placed on the ballot for election on Nov. 6, 1990
